name: studyplan
description: StudyPlan - Calendario e pianificatore esami per studenti
author: StudyPlan Team

scripts.build: node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=p.version.split('.');v[2]=+v[2]+1;p.version=v.join('.');require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');console.log('v'+p.version)" && electron-builder --mac --win && npm run install-app && npm run copy-win
scripts.build:mac: node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=p.version.split('.');v[2]=+v[2]+1;p.version=v.join('.');require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');console.log('v'+p.version)" && electron-builder --mac && npm run install-app
scripts.install-app: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && APP=$(ls -d dist/mac-arm64/*.app 2>/dev/null || ls -d dist/mac/*.app 2>/dev/null) && rm -rf /Applications/StudyPlan.app ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app && ditto "$APP" /Applications/StudyPlan.app && codesign --force --deep --sign - /Applications/StudyPlan.app 2>/dev/null; xattr -cr /Applications/StudyPlan.app; ditto /Applications/StudyPlan.app ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app && codesign --force --deep --sign - ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app 2>/dev/null; xattr -cr ~/Desktop/StudyPlan.app; mkdir -p ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan && rm -f ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan/*.dmg ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan/*.exe && for f in dist/StudyPlan-*-arm64.dmg; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan/StudyPlan_${VER}_arm64.dmg 2>/dev/null; done; for f in dist/StudyPlan-*.dmg; do echo "$f" | grep -q arm64 || cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan/StudyPlan_${VER}_x64.dmg 2>/dev/null; done; for f in dist/"StudyPlan Setup"*.exe; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan/StudyPlan_${VER}.exe 2>/dev/null; done; /System/Library/Frameworks/CoreServices.framework/Versions/A/Frameworks/LaunchServices.framework/Versions/A/Support/lsregister -f /Applications/StudyPlan.app; rm -rf dist/mac-arm64 dist/mac; killall Dock 2>/dev/null; killall Finder 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.copy-win: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && mkdir -p ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan && rm -f ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan/*.exe && for f in dist/"StudyPlan Setup"*.exe; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/StudyPlan/StudyPlan_${VER}.exe 2>/dev/null; done; true
